title: REVEALED: Kenya Ranked First On Watchlist For Severe Human Rights Violations
description: Authorities deployed excessive force, including tear gas, rubber bullets, and live ammunition, resulting in at least 65 deaths and over 1500 arrests. Charges ranging from murder to terrorism have been leveled against demonstrators, a move critics argue is designed to criminalize dissent.
